alert.description: alert: INVMINOR:Invalid Minor Number
alert.msg_template: Problem with network management reporting in frame $frame cage $cage (supernode $supernode drawer $drawer) (Invalid Minor Number)
alert.recommendation: Record the alert ID. Call IBM Service. Call your next level of support and inform them that there is a general network manager problem and give them the alert ID.

alert.description: alert: GC_INVALID:Global Counter invalid: this counter went invalid
alert.msg_template: Problem with global counter in frame $frame cage $cage (supernode $supernode drawer $drawer) (Global Counter invalid: this counter went invalid)
alert.recommendation: There is a problem with a hub chip. Record the alert ID. Call IBM Service. Replace the the local reporting FRU according the FRU list.

alert.description: alert: GC_ID:Global Counter ID conflict
alert.msg_template: Problem with global counter in frame $frame cage $cage supernode $supernode drawer $drawer (Global Counter ID conflict)
alert.recommendation: There is a problem with a hub chip. Record the alert ID. Call IBM Service. Replace the the local reporting FRU according the FRU list.

alert.description: alert: GC_MASTER:Global Counter Takeover: this counter has assumed mastership

alert.recommendation: There is a problem with a hub chip. Record the alert ID. Call IBM Service. Replace the the local reporting FRU according the FRU list.

alert.description: alert: GC_STALE:Global Counter Stale: counter has been made stale by higher ID
alert.msg_template: Problem with global counter in frame $frame cage $cage (supernode $supernode drawer $drawer) (Global Counter Stale: counter has been made stale by higher ID)
alert.recommendation: Record the alert ID. Call your next level of support and inform them that there is a problem with a global counter and give them the alert ID.

alert.description: alert: DLNK_PLANE_WC:D Link Port Lane Width Change
alert.msg_template: D Link Port Lane Width Change between frame $frame cage $cage (supernode $supernode drawer $drawer) hub $hub port $nodePort and frame $neighbor_frame cage $neighbor_cage (supernode $neighbor_supernode drawer $neighbor_drawer) hub $neighbor_hub port $neighbor_nodePort (D Link Port Lane Width Change)
alert.recommendation: There is a problem with a D-Link. Record the alert ID and call IBM Service. Log on to the Management Server. To isolate to the proper FRU, run Link Diags and perform the actions that it recommends. If no action is recommended, because Diags cannot isolate to the proper FRU, replace the FRUs in the order listed.

alert.description: alert: LRLNK_PLANE_WC:LR Link Port Lane Width Change
alert.msg_template: LR Link Port Lane Width Change between frame $frame cage $cage (supernode $supernode drawer $drawer) hub $hub port $remotePort and frame $neighbor_frame cage $neighbor_cage (supernode $neighbor_supernode drawer $neighbor_drawer) hub $neighbor_hub port $neighbor_remotePort (LR Link Port Lane Width Change)

To isolate to the proper FRU, run Link Diags and perform the actions that it recommends. If no action is recommended, because Diags cannot isolate to the proper FRU, replace the FRUs in the order listed.

alert.description: alert: DLNK_INCRC:D Link Inbound Port CRC Threshold Exceeded
alert.msg_template: D-link problem between frame $frame cage $cage (supernode $supernode drawer $drawer) hub $hub port $nodePort and frame $neighbor_frame cage $neighbor_cage (supernode $neighbor_supernode drawer $neighbor_drawer) hub $neighbor_hub port $neighbor_nodePort (D Link Inbound Port CRC Threshold Exceeded)
alert.recommendation: There is a problem with a D-Link. Record the alert ID and call IBM Service. Log on to the Management Server. To isolate to the proper FRU, run Link Diags and perform the actions that it recommends. If no action is recommended, because Diags cannot isolate to the proper FRU, replace the FRUs in the order listed.

alert.description: alert: OMTX_BCLOW:TX Bias Current Low
alert.msg_template: Optical Module event in frame $frame cage $cage (supernode $supernode drawer $drawer) hub $hub port $nodePort (TX Bias Current Low)
alert.recommendation: There is a problem with an optical module. Record the alert ID. Call IBM Service. Replace the the local reporting FRU according the FRU list.

alert.description: alert: OMTX_LOPHIGH:TX LOP High
alert.msg_template: Optical Module event in frame $frame cage $cage (supernode $supernode drawer $drawer) hub $hub port $nodePort (TX LOP High)
alert.recommendation: There is a problem with an optical module. Record the alert ID. Call IBM Service. Replace the the local reporting FRU according the FRU list.

alert.description: alert: OMRX_LOS:RX LOS
alert.msg_template: Optical Module event in frame $frame cage $cage (supernode $supernode drawer $drawer) hub $hub port $nodePort (RX LOS)
alert.recommendation: There is a problem with an optical module. Record the alert ID. Call IBM Service. Replace the the local reporting FRU according the FRU list.

alert.description: alert: OMRX_LIPLOW:RX Light Input Power Low
alert.msg_template: Optical Module event in frame $frame cage $cage (supernode $supernode drawer $drawer) hub $hub port $nodePort (RX Light Input Power Low)
alert.recommendation: There is a problem with an optical module. Record the alert ID. Call IBM Service. Replace the the local reporting FRU according the FRU list.

alert.description: alert: OMRX_LIPHIGH:RX Light Input Power High
alert.msg_template: Optical Module event in frame $frame cage $cage (supernode $supernode drawer $drawer) hub $hub port $nodePort (RX Light Input Power High)
alert.recommendation: There is a problem with an optical module. Record the alert ID. Call IBM Service. Replace the the local reporting FRU according the FRU list.

alert.description: alert: NOSFP:Cannot connect to primary or backup HMC
alert.msg_template: Cannot connect to the the primary nor the backup HMC for reporting serviceable events. (Cannot connect to primary or backup HMC)
alert.recommendation: There is a problem communicating with both the primary and backup HMC for logging network serviceable events. Call IBM Service and report the alert ID. Check the network connections between the EMS and HMCs. If the network problem cannot be isolated and repaired, contact the next level of support.

alert.description: alert: NONBR:No Neighbor Found
alert.msg_template: ISNM cannot find a neighbor for an event that should have one. (No Neighbor Found)
alert.recommendation: A neighbor was not found for an event that requires one. Call IBM Service and report the alert ID. Determine the neighbor, and check for events reported by it, because event analysis would not have been able to relate events on the neighbor to this event; this can result in reporting events that are not serviceable.

alert.description: alert: ON_ERROR_LOC:on_error - location
alert.msg_template: ISNM has reported an invalid location to TEAL. (on_error - location)
alert.recommendation: Record the alert ID, and call your next level of support.

alert.description: alert: FAULTY_OPTICAL_MODULE:Faulty Optical Module
alert.msg_template: Faulty optical module in frame $frame cage $cage (supernode $supernode drawer $drawer) hub $hub (Faulty Optical Module)
alert.recommendation: There is a problem with a hub chip. Record the alert ID. Call IBM service. Replace the FRU according to the FRU list.

alert.description: alert: FAULTY_HUB:Faulty Network Hub
alert.msg_template: Faulty hub in frame $frame cage $cage (supernode $supernode drawer $drawer) hub $hub (Faulty Network Hub)
alert.recommendation: There is a problem with a hub chip. Record the alert ID. Call IBM service. Replace the FRU according to the FRU list.

alert.description: alert: FAULTY_LRCABASSY_PARTIAL:Faulty LR-link cable assembly - partial
alert.msg_template: Faulty LR link cable assembly handle in frame $frame cage $cage (supernode $supernode drawer $drawer) (Faulty LR-link cable assembly - partial)
alert.recommendation: There is a problem with an HFI port or group of HFI ports associated with the LR Link Assembly. The problem may be with a particular handle in the assembly. Record the alert ID. Call IBM Service. Log on to the Management Server. To isolate to the proper FRU, run Link Diags and perform the actions that it recommends. If the port is for LR-links this can be very disruptive to the network for the associated supernode. If no action is recommended, because Diags cannot isolate to the proper FRU, replace the FRUs in the order listed.

alert.description: alert: FAULTY_LRCABASSY:Faulty LR-link cable assembly - full
alert.msg_template: Faulty or removed LR link cable assembly in frame $frame $cage (supernode $supernode drawer $drawer) (Faulty LR-link cable assembly - full)
alert.recommendation: There is a problem with an HFI port or group of HFI ports associated with the LR Link Assembly. Record the alert ID. Call IBM Service. Log on to the Management Server. To isolate to the proper FRU, run Link Diags and perform the actions that it recommends. If the port is for LR-links this can be very disruptive to the network for the associated supernode. If no action is recommended, because Diags cannot isolate to the proper FRU, replace the FRUs in the order listed.

alert.description: alert: FAULTY_LRCABASSY2:Faulty LR-link cable assembly - 2 drawer super node
alert.msg_template: Faulty or removed LR link cable assembly in frame $frame cage $cage (supernode $supernode drawer $drawer) (Faulty LR-link cable assembly - 2 drawer super node)
alert.recommendation: There is a problem with an HFI port or group of HFI ports associated with the LR Link Assembly. Record the alert ID. Call IBM Service. Log on to the Management Server. To isolate to the proper FRU, run Link Diags and perform the actions that it recommends. If the port is for LR-links this can be very disruptive to the network for the associated supernode. If no action is recommended, because Diags cannot isolate to the proper FRU, replace the FRUs in the order listed.

alert.description: alert: FAULTY_LRCABASSY3:Faulty LR-link cable assembly - 3 drawer super node
alert.msg_template: Faulty or removed LR link cable assembly in frame $frame cage $cage (supernode $supernode drawer $drawer) (Faulty LR-link cable assembly - 3 drawer super node)
alert.recommendation: There is a problem with an HFI port or group of HFI ports associated with the LR Link Assembly. Record the alert ID. Call IBM Service. Log on to the Management Server. To isolate to the proper FRU, run Link Diags and perform the actions that it recommends. If the port is for LR-links this can be very disruptive to the network for the associated supernode. If no action is recommended, because Diags cannot isolate to the proper FRU, replace the FRUs in the order listed.

alert.description: alert: SUSPECT_DRAWER:Suspicious Drawer
alert.msg_template: Drawer level event occurred on frame $frame cage $cage (supernode $supernode drawer $drawer). (Suspicious Drawer)
alert.recommendation: A large number of HFI network links attached to a drawer are down without an accompanying power event. Call IBM Service and report the alert ID. If a drawer lost power, then this is a secondary effect.

alert.description: alert: SUSPECT_supernode:Suspicious supernode
alert.msg_template: supernode level event occurred on frame $frame supernode $supernode. Multiple drawers in a supernode are impacted. (Suspicious supernode)
alert.recommendation: A large number of HFI network links attached to a supernode are down without an accompanying power event. Call IBM Service and report the alert ID. If a supernode lost power, then this is a secondary effect.

alert.description: alert: SUSPECT_FRAME:Suspicious Frame
alert.msg_template: Frame level event occurred in frame $frame. Multiple CECs are impacted. (Suspicious Frame)
alert.recommendation: A large number of HFI network links in a Frame are down without an accompanying power event. Call IBM Service and report the alert ID. If a frame lost power, then this is a secondary effect.

alert.description: alert: NETWORKFAULT:Network Fault
alert.msg_template: HFI Network Fault (Network Fault)
alert.recommendation: Record the alert ID. Call your next level of support and inform them that there is a general network problem and give them the alert ID.

alert.description: alert: BOUNCINGDLNK:Bouncing D-Link
alert.msg_template: D-link bouncing between frame $frame cage $cage (supernode $supernode drawer $drawer) hub $hub port $nodePort and frame $neighbor_frame cage $neighbor_cage (supernode $neighbor_supernode drawer $neighbor_drawer) hub $neighbor_hub port $neighbor_nodePort (Bouncing D-Link)
alert.recommendation: There is a problem with a D-Link. Record the alert ID and call IBM Service. Log on to the Management Server. To isolate to the proper FRU, run Link Diags and perform the actions that it recommends. If no action is recommended, because Diags cannot isolate to the proper FRU, replace the FRUs in the order listed.

alert.description: alert: BOUNCINGLRLNK:Bouncing LR-Link
alert.msg_template: LR-link bouncing between frame $frame cage $cage (supernode $supernode drawer $drawer ) hub $hub port $nodePort and frame $neighbor_frame cage $neighbor_cage (supernode $neighbor_supernode drawer $neighbor_drawer) hub $neighbor_hub port $neighbor_nodePort (Bouncing LR-Link)
alert.recommendation: There is a problem with an LR-Link. Record the alert ID and call IBM service. Log on to the Management Server. To isolate to the proper FRU, run Link Diags and perform the actions that it recommends. If no action is recommended, because Diags cannot isolate to the proper FRU, replace the FRUs in the order listed.
alert.fru_list: ISO:HFI_LDG, SYM:HFI_CAB:nbr_port, SYM:CBLCONT:local_port, SYM:HFI_OM:nbr_om1, SYM:HFI_OM:local_om1, FRU:nbr_torrent,FRU:local_torrent, SYM:HFI_OM:nbr_om2,SYM:HFI_OM:local_om2
